rows.Problem: Lag when swiping left and right on the navigation bar to switch between apps. rows.Title: Game performance degraded after update
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 8.0 Beta, Free Fire Max auto-detects only Smooth/Standard graphics instead of Ultra, resulting in severe frame drops and lag even on Standard High FPS. Device temperature quickly reaches 42°C, indicating poor GPU driver optimization and thermal management.
rows.Summarized Problem: Game performance has degraded after the One UI 8.0 Beta update, with poor graphics detection and severe frame drops despite standard settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences severe lag and overheating during gameplay, making the experience unusable and impacting core functionality.

rows.Title: None of the contacts photo gets displayed in widget
rows.Problem: Lockstar application app widgets are not working correctly after beta update installation. If i am trying to add contacts widget, none of the contacts photo gets displayed. Also everytime i add left and right bottom corner applications they get removed on restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts photos do not display in the contacts widget after a beta update.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget fails to show contact photos, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Video not playing in full screen in facebook
rows.Problem: Full-screen video not playing in Facebook live and recorded videos; there is lots of blank space around the video and the video screen size is too small, even on a large screen like S24 Ultra. This issue occurs only in Facebook.
rows.Summarized Problem: Facebook video playback fails in full screen with excessive blank space and a small video size.
rows.Severity Reason: The video playback fails entirely in full screen, which is a core functionality for user experience on Facebook, making it unusable.

rows.Title: My Files app stutters when going to internal storage
rows.Problem: My Files app stutters when going to internal storage option from any other folder
rows.Summarized Problem: The My Files app slows down or stutters when navigating to the internal storage option from any folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The app experiences stuttering during navigation, which affects usability but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Now Brief not updating data
rows.Problem: The Now Brief won't update properly and won't appear on the lockscreen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature fails to update and does not appear on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the lock screen and does not update, but the device remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: Unable to change widget shapes
rows.Problem: Home up is messing up with every widget shape on homescreen
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change widget shapes on the lock screen, and the home up function causes widget shapes to malfunction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Secure Folder While upload files not displaying
rows.Problem: When initiating a file upload in the Secure Folder, the system is not displaying files from the Secure Folder and instead shows files from the personal, non-secure directory.
rows.Summarized Problem: File upload in the Secure Folder does not show files from the Secure Folder and displays files from the personal directory instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect file visibility but does not result in device crash or complete failure of core functionality.

rows.Title: App suggestion page always displays in light mode
rows.Problem: My search bar area is always in light mode even if I turn on dark mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The app suggestion page consistently displays in light mode despite the user enabling dark mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI element under dark mode settings but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: The back swipe preview is not working properly
rows.Problem: The predictive back gesture does not work and is inconsistent, sometimes failing entirely. It feels like the system forgets the feature is present, and it only works in very limited places even in native Samsung apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The predictive back gesture in settings does not work consistently and fails frequently, even in native Samsung apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works intermittently and fails in multiple contexts, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device unusability.

rows.Title: Unable to apply video wallpaper for homescreen
rows.Problem: UI crash occurred after setting video wallpaper, now only lock screen supports video wallpaper option; homescreen no longer shows the option despite previous functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can no longer set video wallpapers on the homescreen after a UI crash, with the feature now only available on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from using a core feature on the homescreen, rendering the home screen experience incomplete and unusable.

rows.Title: Bixby misunderstands my commands, replace the 'T' in 'Shahjeet' with a 'D'
rows.Problem: Bixby often misunderstands my commands, especially with names. It might replace the 'T' in 'Shahjeet' with a 'D'. Google Assistant works flawlessly and currently requires me to press the power button to activate, which is not ideal. I would like the option to select either Bixby or Google Assistant as the default, or use both seamlessly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby misinterprets names such as 'Shahjeet' by replacing the 'T' with 'D', and requires manual activation via the power button, unlike Google Assistant which works flawlessly and can be used hands-free.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby misinterprets commands and requires manual activation, impacting usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Widget shape have changes from 1st beta
rows.Problem: The widgets are not curved. They were beautiful in first beta now look off. I'm certain this is a bug since it shows the curves in the widgets but when apply it becomes boxy
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets are no longer curved and appear boxy instead of curved, differing from the first beta version.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Suddenly half of the screen went black
rows.Problem: Suddenly half of the screen went black, even the auto rotate was off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display suddenly shows half of the screen as black, even when auto-rotation is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial screen blackout, rendering part of the device unusable.

rows.Title: Device restart automatically
rows.Problem: My phone s24 is suddenly switched off and not able to restart for 5 minutes, after which the phone is lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: A Samsung Galaxy S24 suddenly shuts off and fails to restart, resulting in significant lag after reboot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device unexpectedly shuts off and fails to restart, rendering it unusable for a period and causing severe lag after power recovery.

rows.Title: Sleep Tracking Issue After Updating to UI 8 Beta: Missing Sleep Details When Watch is Removed for Charging
rows.Problem: After updating to UI 8 beta, sleep details are not showing when the watch is removed for charging. Previously, if the user got up multiple times at night, the watch would show wake-up times and sleep details upon waking. Now, only the time when the watch is removed for charging is recorded, and no data is shown for nighttime activity. This is critical for a heart patient.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sleep tracking stops working when the watch is removed for charging, showing only the charging time instead of full sleep activity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents accurate monitoring of sleep patterns, which is critical for a heart patient using the feature for health management.

rows.Title: Notifications Max 2 notifications are showing in cards view others in icon only
rows.Problem: Only two notifications are shown in the cards view on lockscreen; any new notifications after the second one show up as an icon.
rows.Summarized Problem: On the lock screen, only two notifications are displayed in the cards view, and additional notifications appear as icons.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of notification display, affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Music wave effect not coming in music card progress
rows.Problem: The music wave effect is no longer visible on the quick panel and notification bar, only appearing on the lock screen. It needs to display on the lock screen whatever animated scene any music app provides while playing music to make the Samsung interface look classic.
rows.Summarized Problem: The music wave effect is missing from the quick panel and notification bar, and only visible on the lock screen, where it should display animated music scenes from any music app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual feedback during music playback but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Live Notification showing cropped
rows.Problem: Glitch in live notification
rows.Summarized Problem: Live notifications are displayed with cropped content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial display of notifications but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Wallpaper and Style The color pallete doesn't change with wallpaper change
rows.Problem: The color pallete doesn't change with wallpaper change, everytime we have to turn off and on to see the new colors and then apply. The new pallete should be selected and applied by default.
rows.Summarized Problem: The color palette does not update when the wallpaper changes and requires device restart to apply new colors.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction where the feature fails to respond to a normal user action, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to select clock font option
rows.Problem: New clock options are ghosted and not able to select them
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select clock font options as new clock options appear ghosted.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full customization of the clock but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Screen lag and resolution issues observed when routine is observed
rows.Problem: Screen lag and resolution issues occur when using night time routines that turn off AOD and set screen resolution to FHD. Text size becomes very small and screen appears in tablet mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen lags and appears in tablet mode with small text when night time routines activate.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable performance degradation and visual inconsistency during routine execution, but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Sound Issues observed in sound after ending the call
rows.Problem: After ending a call, media sounds are muted or the device still thinks I'm in a call even after the call has ended.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media sounds are muted after ending a call, even though the call has ended.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure in audio during call end, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Call drop observed
rows.Problem: Frequent call drops. Not able to hear voice on other side, this is happening frequently.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent call drops and are unable to hear the other party's voice during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops prevent users from making or receiving calls, rendering a core communication function unusable.

rows.Title: Asphalt legend game crash
rows.Problem: Asphalt legends game crashes frequently, unsure if due to One UI8 or other factors
rows.Summarized Problem: The Asphalt legends game crashes frequently and users are unsure whether it is caused by One UI8 or another factor.
rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes frequently, making it unusable and preventing normal gameplay.

rows.Title: Secure folder does not prompt for fingerprint or password on re-entry
rows.Problem: Secure Folder does not prompt for fingerprint or password on re-entry, even when "lock every time" is enabled. Once unlocked, user can leave to another app or home screen, return, and Secure Folder opens directly without asking for authentication. Expected: Always request authentication. Actual: Folder stays open until manually locked.
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder fails to prompt for authentication upon re-entry, even when 'lock every time' is enabled, leading to reduced security protection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue undermines the device's security mechanism by allowing unauthorized access without authentication after re-entry.

rows.Title: Unable to block number in phone book
rows.Problem: I can't block my number not in phone book. It's not block automatically. Please help me. I used third party app (turecaller). It's working properly. Your method is only unknown number and sparm call not automatically. Numbers not in phonebook only people in your phonebook will be able to call you. It's option not showing samsung calling app. Please do something please.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot block numbers not in their phone book, and the option to block unknown numbers is missing in the Samsung Calling app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing for numbers not in the phone book, but the core functionality for blocking numbers is still available for contacts in the phone book.

rows.Title: Music begins playing unexpectedly once an app is closed
rows.Problem: Unexpected music starts playing out of nowhere after closing an app. Persists and plays over other media. Has happened twice so far. After the first appearance of the issue, restarted the phone. For the second, automatically stopped as soon as I opened Members app and the phone started generating log reports.
rows.Summarized Problem: Music plays unexpectedly after closing apps and continues playing over other media.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unexpected audio playback that interferes with normal device usage and other media, leading to a disruptive user experience.

rows.Title: Samsung browser consuming a lot of battery
rows.Problem: Samsung browser is consuming a lot of battery percentage without even using it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung browser consumes excessive battery even when not in use.
rows.Severity Reason: The browser is consuming significant battery without user activity, leading to rapid battery drain and potential device unusability.

rows.Title: Whatsapp does not load
rows.Problem: The WhatsApp application does not open and shows an opening screen; it only works after closing and reopening the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp fails to open and displays a loading screen, requiring a restart to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to launch properly but can be resolved by restarting, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Excessive heating issue after updating to OneUI 8 beta 2 on Galaxy S24 Plus, with no background apps running or apps opened, causing front display to heat; heating from backside near camera when using camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats significantly after a beta update, even with no apps running, and heating increases when using the camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage, which could lead to performance degradation or hardware damage, making it unusable or unsafe.

rows.Title: Lock screen clock keeps on switching its position
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock keeps on switching its position
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen continuously switches positions.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock position switching occurs intermittently over time, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Device auto-restarts even when it is disabled
rows.Problem: The phone automatically restarts itself even if Auto restart is turned off
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically restarts even when the auto-restart feature is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly, making it unusable and indicating a critical system malfunction.

rows.Title: All pictures lost from gallery
rows.Problem: All photos from gallery section have been deleted, gallery is now empty
rows.Summarized Problem: All photos have been deleted from the gallery section.
rows.Severity Reason: User has lost all photos, a critical data loss issue that renders the gallery unusable.

rows.Title: Network issues faced when 2 sims are used
rows.Problem: When two SIM cards are inserted in the phone, the internet speed decreases, it gets stuck while watching videos, the network does not come properly, when the person on the other end calls, the phone shows busy, the call cannot be made. If we use one SIM card in the phone, there is no such problem.
rows.Summarized Problem: Using two SIM cards causes network instability, reduced internet speed, video playback issues, and call connection failures.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish proper network connections and makes calls, rendering basic communication functions unusable.

rows.Title: Lock icon appearing smaller than usual
rows.Problem: Lock icon appearing smaller than usual
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen icon appears smaller than usual.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a minor visual change that does not affect device usability or functionality.

rows.Title: Search area remains in light mode even when dark mode is enabled
rows.Problem: Search area is always in light mode even when dark mode is turned on
rows.Summarized Problem: The search area in the settings remains in light mode even when dark mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI element under dark mode but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Swiping up to go to home screen is not working
rows.Problem: Swiping up to go Home gesture is not triggering a haptic feedback
rows.Summarized Problem: Swiping up to go to the home screen does not trigger haptic feedback.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture does not provide haptic feedback, which is a partial malfunction of the interaction feedback.

rows.Title: Decline in the performance of the Expert RAW camera feature
rows.Problem: The Expert RAW camera feature exhibits inconsistencies in capturing and processing RAW images, including image storage failures and improper rendering, leading to performance lags even at 24MP settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Expert RAW camera feature fails to consistently capture and process RAW images, resulting in storage errors and rendering issues with performance lags.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent image storage failures and rendering problems, significantly impacting core camera functionality and user experience.

rows.Title: Status bar not visible after Beta update
rows.Problem: The status bar becomes invisible after second beta update
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar is missing after a beta update.
rows.Severity Reason: The status bar is not visible, which affects user visibility of essential information, but the device remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: App icon in homescreen and in drawer have diff color intensity
rows.Problem: Apps in home screen and apps in app drawer have different color intensity; icons in app drawer appear faded with no deep black or contrast, unlike on homescreen.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons on the home screen and app drawer have inconsistent color intensity, with drawer icons appearing faded and lacking deep black contrast.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, only a noticeable UI difference.

rows.Title: Orange notification toggle on keyboard emoji icon
rows.Problem: Orange notification toggle on keyboard emoji icon is always coming even when nothing new is there and just won't disappear
rows.Summarized Problem: The orange notification toggle on the keyboard emoji icon appears continuously when no new notifications are present and does not disappear.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification persists when no content is available, causing user annoyance, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Widgets selected shape changed when applied
rows.Problem: The widgets are all boxy in shape after updating to One UI 8 beta 2 on Samsung S24. Widgets appear in correct proportion and shape during preview but become boxy when applied.
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets display as boxy shapes after application, despite appearing correctly in preview.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget appearance after application but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: UI issue observed in camera settings
rows.Problem: In camera at WATERMARK section the end of the page overlaps the previous camera settings activity page
rows.Summarized Problem: The end of the WATERMARK section in camera settings overlaps with the previous camera settings page.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual overlap in the camera settings interface, affecting user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Wallpaper gets blurred while launching or closing any application
rows.Problem: Wallpaper blur when opening or closing an app is a sudden change, which seems like a flash of light and isn't pleasing to the eyes. Fix this and add gradient gaussian blur
rows.Summarized Problem: Wallpaper appears blurred when apps are launched or closed, causing a sudden visual flash that is visually unpleasant.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable visual anomaly during app transitions but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Widgets coming in irregular shapes on homescreen
rows.Problem: Irregular shapes and bugs of widgets on the screen have appeared after updating to One UI 8 Beta 2
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets on the homescreen appear in irregular shapes after updating to One UI 8 Beta 2.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual bugs but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Samsung caller id protection can't block spam or fraud calls
rows.Problem: Samsung caller id protection can't block spam or fraud calls, either not manually

rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to perform its core function in blocking spam and fraud calls, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Problem: I am not able to download beta program update after joined beta program
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot download beta program updates after joining the beta program.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the update download process, preventing users from completing the update flow but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Sending message goes to failure
rows.Problem: Sending message goes to failure
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot send messages through the Samsung Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to send messages, which is a core functionality of the app, making it unusable for basic communication.

rows.Title: Payzapp application is not working
rows.Problem: Payzapp application is not working

rows.Severity Reason: The application is completely non-functional, preventing user access to a key service.

rows.Title: Lens flare observed in the pictures
rows.Problem: The lens flare has increased significantly and it is impacting all the camera modules- including the selfie camera. This is also observed with Expert Raw camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: A significant increase in lens flare is observed across all camera modules, including the selfie camera and Expert Raw mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multiple camera functions but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Problem: Calls are dropping, not merging, and animations are not working properly

rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot attach files from the My Files app or Chrome browser when applying for jobs or sending emails.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to perform essential file attachment tasks, impacting core functionality of email and job applications.

rows.Title: Unable to merge calls
rows.Problem: Still unable to merge calls; getting disconnected. Sometimes the dialer opens automatically and weird sounds are generated.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot merge calls and frequently get disconnected, with the dialer opening automatically and strange sounds occurring.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent disconnections and unexpected dialer behavior, disrupting core call functionality.

rows.Title: Even after finishing drive, it shows driving mode even after an hour

rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not automatically detect when driving is finished, leading to a partial malfunction in functionality.

rows.Problem: While offline or online video being played in landscape it shows cutout on all videos being played, video player open in background while responding to this request.

rows.Title: The icon doesn't become transparent

rows.Summarized Problem: The icon on the lock screen does not become transparent when set to 20% transparency, only working intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the lock screen customization feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: WhatsApp keeps crashing everytime
rows.Problem: WhatsApp keeps crashing everytime I open it
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp crashes every time it is opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on opening, making it unusable for communication.

rows.Title: Call drop during call
rows.Problem: After the One UI 8 beta update, I am facing call drops all the time. I can't talk to others during calls. Please, this is a serious issue that I am facing constantly. I request Samsung Care to fix this as soon as possible.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call drops occur frequently during phone calls after the One UI 8 beta update, preventing users from communicating effectively.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops prevent users from making or receiving calls, rendering the device unusable for basic communication.

rows.Title: Apps is sleep state still consuming battery
rows.Problem: Apps that are slated for sleep are still consuming battery.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps in sleep state continue to consume battery instead of entering true sleep mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Device battery drains unexpectedly due to apps not properly entering sleep mode, leading to reduced battery life and potential user frustration.

rows.Title: CPU 과점 증가
rows.Problem: The app 'com.samsung.android.liveeffectservice' has a single thread (ThreadHandler-W) that continuously occupies 10% or more of CPU usage for up to 2 hours, leading to excessive CPU usage. This causes battery drain, device slowing, and overheating. The thread does not properly terminate, resulting in system instability and potential app kill events.
rows.Summarized Problem: A background thread in the LiveEffectService app continuously occupies high CPU usage for extended periods, causing battery drain, device slowing, and overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to overheat, slow down, and drain battery rapidly, making the device unusable under normal conditions.

rows.Title: Background app excessive battery drain
rows.Problem: Background app consumes over 1% battery in one hour when not charging, especially in PROCESS_STATE_IMPORTANT_BACKGROUND or higher states, leading to poor user experience due to unnoticed battery consumption.
rows.Summarized Problem: A background app continuously drains battery at a rate of over 1% per hour, causing noticeable battery depletion and degraded user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The app consumes battery at a high rate in background, leading to device unusability and poor user experience.

rows.Title: Personal Data intelligence keeps crashing followed by now brief crash
rows.Problem: Personal Data intelligence keeps crashing and now brief also crashes
rows.Summarized Problem: Personal Data Intelligence feature keeps crashing and causes a brief interruption in the Now bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature crashes repeatedly, leading to a loss of functionality and user experience.

rows.Title: Screen mode set as vivid, but display feels like natural
rows.Problem: The display color even set on vivid are appearing like being set on natural.

rows.Problem: Notifications have inconsistent background color and blur intensity; some notifications show different colors and blur levels than others, especially when the notification panel is reopened. The issue persists even without theme park customizations, and when theme park is applied, colors and blur do not sync properly after reopening the panel.

rows.Title: Secure Folder crashes when try to open using fingerprint
rows.Problem: Secure Folder crashes when trying to open using fingerprint. This happens only when 'Allow background activity while locked' is disabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder crashes when attempting to open with fingerprint authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during a core authentication function, preventing users from accessing secure content.

rows.Title: Notifications are showing misaligned
rows.Problem: The data displayed on notifications looks out of place when there is no third field of notification data from a particular app. The rendering logic could be improved to handle such scenarios.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications display misaligned when lacking a third data field.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual misalignment but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes.

rows.Title: The lockscreen clock moves to the middle automatically
rows.Problem: The lockscreen clock moves to the middle automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen moves to the middle position automatically.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the clock display but does not render the lock screen unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Widgets alignment is not correct in 5X6 grid
rows.Problem: Widgets need to be correct
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets are misaligned in a 5x6 grid layout on the display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget positioning but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Device become unresponsive during normal usage
rows.Problem: Screen becomes irresponsive at times, preventing use of any apps or navigation, requiring frequent force restarts to recover functionality
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen becomes unresponsive during normal use, preventing app interaction and navigation, requiring force restarts to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, making it unusable without restart, which is a critical functional failure.

rows.Title: WhatsApp downloads not showing in gallery
rows.Problem: WhatsApp downloads not showing in gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp download files are not appearing in the gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure as files are missing from the gallery but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Ai writing assistance suggested replies not working
rows.Problem: Ai writing assistance suggested replies not working in app like WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: Ai writing assistance suggested replies are not working in apps like WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function in specific apps, but the device remains usable and no critical system failure occurs.

rows.Title: Device shows connected to android auto even after moving away from the car
rows.Problem: Phone shows connected to Android Auto after moving away from the car, screen becomes non-responsive, lock and unlock work with biometrics but no content visible. Holding power button for 10 seconds does not restart the device. Screen returns to normal only after receiving a call.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device remains connected to Android Auto after leaving the car and screen becomes non-responsive, despite biometric lock/unlock working.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes completely unresponsive for 30 minutes, preventing normal usage until a call triggers a screen recovery.

rows.Title: Flickering occur when pop appears
rows.Problem: See video for details. In case attached the log is insufficient or H/W inspection is necessary please resolve this issue with your analysis result and what you need for further analysis within 2 weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display flickers when a pop-up appears on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent visual disturbance but does not prevent device usage or cause device failure.

rows.Title: Android auto getting disconnected frequently
rows.Problem: Android auto getting disconnected frequently and connection back is causing issues sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: Android Auto frequently disconnects after connection, with issues when reconnecting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connectivity problems but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Device stays on incoming call screen even after answering it
rows.Problem: After the call is picked, the screen still shows incoming call and there is connection problem.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device remains on the incoming call screen after the call is answered, with a connection issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to transition from incoming call to call active state, making it unusable during call handling.

rows.Title: Steps count increase while driving car
rows.Problem: While driving car it counted steps
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Health app incorrectly counts steps while the user is driving a car.

rows.Problem: In some application interface display size get bigger and we can't operate because of the navigation buttons displayed over the app functions same in notification bar also
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar overlaps over app interfaces, making them unoperable and affecting functionality in the notification bar as well.
rows.Severity Reason: The navigation bar overlapping prevents user operation of app interfaces, rendering them unusable.

rows.Title: Jitter while closing split screen apps
rows.Problem: The system feels jittery whilst closing split screen apps.

rows.Title: Color palette is not getting updated upon change of wallpaper

rows.Summarized Problem: The color palette does not update automatically when a new wallpaper is selected and requires manual intervention to refresh.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to update automatically but can be manually triggered, resulting in partial functionality.

rows.Title: DnD is getting triggered when phone is switch on

rows.Problem: Bluetooth not connecting with android auto

rows.Title: While device is locked and in pocket messages and emails type automatically

rows.Title: Several apps are crashing after One UI 8 update
rows.Problem: Several apps are crashing after One UI 8 update, such as Spotify and OTT apps, and Samsung apps running in the background, causing RAM space to become full
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple apps crash after the One UI 8 update, leading to RAM exhaustion and system instability.
rows.Severity Reason: Crashes of multiple apps including Spotify and OTT platforms cause system instability and full RAM usage, making the device unusable.

rows.Title: WhatsApp showing someone else message with someone else profile picture
rows.Problem: WhatsApp showing someone else message with someone else profile picture in notification
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp displays messages from another user with a different profile picture in notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are seeing incorrect messages and profiles, which can lead to confusion and potential privacy concerns, making the app unreliable and misleading.

rows.Title: Charging Status Showing Charging but Battery Stuck at 61%
rows.Problem: Charging status shows 'charging' but battery level remains stuck at 61% and does not increase over 1-2 hours. After restarting the phone, the battery level jumps to 99%.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery charging status shows 'charging' but level remains stuck at 61% and does not increase over several hours, jumping to 99% after a restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device appears to be unable to properly charge the battery, which prevents accurate battery level updates and may lead to user confusion or device malfunction.

rows.Title: YouTube application not changing to light mode
rows.Problem: Youtube application not changing to light mode when its appearance set to "use device theme"
rows.Summarized Problem: The YouTube app does not switch to light mode when the device theme is set to 'use device theme'.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Multi window While using Instagram and you tube app glitch for a sec
rows.Problem: Switching between YouTube and Instagram in partial split-screen mode causes the bottom part of the YouTube app to glitch out for a second.
rows.Summarized Problem: Switching between YouTube and Instagram in split-screen mode causes a brief glitch in the YouTube app's bottom section.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs during app switching in a split-screen setup but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to update Google play system update
rows.Problem: Unable to update Google play system update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update the Google Play system update.
rows.Severity Reason: The system update failure prevents the device from receiving critical software updates, potentially leading to instability or security risks.

rows.Title: Good lock some plugins are not working like home up
rows.Problem: Some plugins are not working like home up
rows.Summarized Problem: Certain plugins on the lock screen are not functioning properly, such as the home up feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects specific functionality on the lock screen but does not prevent device usage or cause complete failure.

rows.Title: YouTube bar at bottom of video is half visible
rows.Problem: The bar at the bottom of a YouTube video is half visible and half not visible.
rows.Summarized Problem: The bottom bar of a YouTube video is partially visible, making it difficult to use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of a key UI element during video playback but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: GoodLock Noti Star and Quick Star is not working
rows.Problem: GoodLock NotiStar and QuickStar is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: GoodLock's NotiStar and QuickStar features are not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable and does not crash or freeze.

rows.Title: WhatsApp application not showing name for number even it is saved
rows.Problem: WhatsApp application not showing name for my own number even if that is saved in my phone
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp does not display the name for a saved number, even when the contact is stored on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects contact display functionality but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core operations.

rows.Title: Google chrome sign in issues like cooking and passcode not working properly
rows.Problem: Google Chrome sign in issues like cooking and passcode not working properly, even with cookies allowed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience issues with Google Chrome sign-in, specifically with the cooking and passcode functions, despite allowing cookies.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality but does not completely prevent device use or cause system crashes.

rows.Title: Unable to use HOME Up in good lock
rows.Problem: Unable to use HOME Up in good lock
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the HOME Up function on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable, preventing smooth navigation from the lock screen but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Phone auto restart
rows.Problem: Phone auto restart
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone automatically restarts without user intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly, which makes it unusable and indicates a critical system failure.

rows.Title: Battery drains at an abnormal rate
rows.Problem: Battery quickly discharges, doesn't last as usual, even with battery protection set to 80% and adaptive power saving enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains at an abnormal rate despite using battery protection and adaptive power saving features.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly even with power-saving settings active, indicating a significant performance or hardware issue that affects device usability.

rows.Title: Battery back up not good after one ui beta
rows.Problem: Battery back up not good after one ui beta testing
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery backup is poor after one UI beta testing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of battery performance after a UI update, but does not render the device unusable or cause complete failure.

rows.Title: Overheating while using youtube music
rows.Problem: While using youtube music getting overheating
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats when using YouTube Music.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during usage, which can lead to performance issues or hardware damage.

rows.Title: NFC is not working
rows.Problem: NFC is not working, I tried to perform the diagnostic test for NFC which was also not completed
rows.Summarized Problem: NFC functionality is not working and diagnostic tests fail to complete.
rows.Severity Reason: NFC is a core device feature that fails to function and diagnostic tests do not complete, indicating a major malfunction.

rows.Title: Camera clicked pictures are showing blurry
rows.Problem: Pictures become blurry when clicked
rows.Summarized Problem: Pictures taken with the camera appear blurry.

rows.Title: Keyboard word prediction is not working
rows.Problem: Keyboard word prediction is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Keyboard word prediction feature is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work, but the device remains usable and no critical functions are affected.

rows.Title: Device automatically shutdown
rows.Problem: Device automatically shutdown

rows.Severity Reason: The device shutting down automatically renders it unusable, indicating a critical failure in power management.

rows.Title: Live wallpaper getting stuck when open & close recent tab

rows.Summarized Problem: Live wallpaper becomes stuck when recent tabs are opened and closed, returning to normal only after screen touch.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the wallpaper feature, affecting user experience during tab switching but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera shaking and vibrating in ultra-wide mode
rows.Problem: Camera shaking and vibrating in ultra-wide mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera shakes and vibrates when using ultra-wide mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera shaking and vibrating during use renders the feature unusable and may indicate a hardware or software instability issue.

rows.Title: Back button is not working in Google Discovery page
rows.Problem: The Back button is not working when we are in Google Discovery page and forced to come back after pressing Home button.
rows.Summarized Problem: The back button does not function on the Google Discovery page, requiring users to press Home to return to the previous screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents smooth navigation but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Portrait mode become noisy not clear in 3x and 2x
rows.Problem: Portrait mode become noisy not clear in 3x and 2
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait mode is noisy and unclear in 3x and 2x zoom settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality in key zoom settings, leading to poor user experience and potential usability failure in photo capture.

rows.Title: Active apps button overlaps with status bar
rows.Problem: Active apps button overlaps with status bar
rows.Summarized Problem: The active apps button on the status bar overlaps with the status bar, causing visual obstruction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Math solver option not available
rows.Problem: Math solver not available
rows.Summarized Problem: The math solver option is not available in the settings menu.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Ai select not capturing the pop-up message
rows.Problem: AI select is not able to capture Android app notifications; it captures the whole screen but fails to capture notifications that appear at the bottom of the screen. Notifications may disappear before AI select completes its capture due to timing issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: AI Select fails to capture Android app notifications that appear at the bottom of the screen, often due to timing issues causing notifications to disappear before capture completes.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions, missing key notifications, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Google contact backup notification occurs repeatedly
rows.Problem: Google contact backup notification repeats multiple times daily, even without adding new contacts, and appears briefly in notifications before disappearing. This behavior was not present in previous stable versions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google contact backup notifications repeat frequently and briefly, despite no new contacts being added.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes irritation and intermittent disruption of the notification experience, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Application icons occasionally fail to render, displaying as blank spaces
rows.Problem: Within the consolidated application folder, application icons occasionally fail to render, displaying as blank spaces until the folder is expanded.
rows.Summarized Problem: Application icons in the home screen folder occasionally fail to render and appear as blank spaces until the folder is expanded.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen interface but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Device gets freezed & touch not working
rows.Problem: My phone got freezed in between. No touch was working, no button was working. Phone display turned black after few seconds.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and touch input stops working, with the display turning black after a few seconds.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive with no touch or button input, and the display turns black, making it unusable.

rows.Title: Device feels a bit slow after Beta update
rows.Problem: After updating to the One UI Beta version, the RAM usage has increased a lot. Even during normal usage, it shows 80–90% RAM being used, even when no heavy apps are running in the background. The phone feels a bit slow, and apps often reload while multitasking. This issue was not there before the beta update. I think RAM management was better in the stable version. Please optimize RAM usage again in upcoming updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device feels slow after a beta update due to significantly increased RAM usage during normal operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable slowness and app reloads during multitasking, but does not result in crashes or complete device failure.

rows.Title: Charging issues
rows.Problem: Since installing One UI 8 beta, the device sometimes charges and sometimes does not. This issue occurs even with different Samsung chargers.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device intermittently charges when connected to a charger, sometimes failing to charge at all.
rows.Severity Reason: The charging function is inconsistent but does not completely fail or render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Secure folder not functioning properly
rows.Problem: The secure folder is malfunctioning; the "move to secure folder" option is unavailable in the file manager. The fingerprint lock for the secure folder is also non-functional, and immediate locking of the secure folder is not operating correctly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder is not functioning properly due to missing move-to-option and non-functional fingerprint lock and immediate locking.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder is a core security feature, and its malfunction prevents user access and compromises device security.

rows.Title: Unlock using fingerprint sometimes black screen appears for 2 sec
rows.Problem: Whenever I enter the mobile using my fingerprint, there is a black screen for 1-2 seconds.
rows.Summarized Problem: A black screen appears for 1-2 seconds when unlocking the device using fingerprint.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual interruption during authentication but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Live match is not showing in now bar on lock screen
rows.Problem: A live match is not showing in my now bar on lock screen. I am not able to use my bar to view live scores.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live match scores are not displayed in the now bar on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The now bar is a core feature for real-time live score viewing, and its failure prevents users from accessing live match information.

rows.Title: Samsung wallet doesn't update FastTag balance
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet doesn't update FastTag balance
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung wallet fails to update the FastTag balance in real time.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a delay in balance updates but does not render the wallet unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Problem: Unable to make cellular call while on teams meeting in work profile

rows.Title: Multi window Sometimes the new split screen feature doesn't work properly in landscape mode

rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails intermittently, affecting usability in specific scenarios but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Problem: S Pen's text-to-speech function stopped working after the One UI 8 beta update. I've tried toggling it off and on, and even restarting my device, but it's still not responding.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: My battery has become worse with the one ui beta. Earlier I would easily get 6 hours plus SOT but now it has gone down to close to 5 hrs. I don't game on my phone. The most battery consuming task I perform is a few minutes of whatsapp video call that lasts less than 30 mins during one charging cycle. Also the battery depletes faster once the battery percentage goes below than 50%.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain, especially when battery level drops below 50%, despite minimal usage such as short WhatsApp video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain below 50% leads to frequent recharging and reduced device usability, impacting daily operation.

rows.Summarized Problem: The phone becomes excessively hot and brightness drops significantly when capturing photos or videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during media capture, which can lead to performance instability or damage if not addressed.

rows.Title: Display brightness drops completely as device heats
rows.Problem: Display brightness drops completely when device overheats, even when extra brightness mode is enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: Display brightness drops to very low levels when the device heats up, even with extra brightness mode enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the display to become unusable during overheating, significantly impacting user experience and device functionality.

rows.Title: Apps not showing as 6x7 in the search app suggestions section
rows.Problem: App drawer grid size set to 6x7 is not reflected in search app suggestions section, showing only 4 columns horizontally instead of 6.
rows.Summarized Problem: The search app suggestions section displays only 4 columns instead of the expected 6x7 grid when the app drawer is set to 6x7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Quick settings icons are coming as light shaded when dark mode is on & vice versa
rows.Problem: Quick settings icons appear light shaded when dark mode is off and dark shaded when light mode is off, which is incorrect. They should only be shaded in the active mode, not in the opposite mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Quick settings icons incorrectly display in the opposite mode of the system theme, failing to match the expected dark or light appearance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent UI behavior but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Lock screen shortcut getting disappear when there is now bar for music
rows.Problem: Lock screen shortcut getting disappear when there is now bar for music or any live update
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen shortcut disappears when the now bar for music is displayed or during live updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the lock screen interface, affecting usability during music playback but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Calls are failing to connect when using Link to Windows
rows.Problem: Outgoing calls are failing to connect and are subsequently disconnecting when using the "Link to Windows" feature to connect a device to a Samsung Book 5 Pro laptop.
rows.Summarized Problem: Outgoing calls fail to connect and disconnect when using the Link to Windows feature.
rows.Severity Reason: Calls are failing to connect and disconnect, making the feature unusable during device-laptop pairing.

rows.Title: Not connecting to cellular network while roaming
rows.Problem: Not connecting to cellular network, frequent disconnect while roaming
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to connect to cellular network and frequently disconnects while roaming.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot maintain a stable cellular connection while roaming, which prevents basic communication functionality.

rows.Title: Apps are crashing or freezing repeatedly
rows.Problem: Some apps are crashing or freezing repeatedly
rows.Summarized Problem: Some apps repeatedly crash or freeze on the launcher.
rows.Severity Reason: App crashes and freezes prevent normal device usage, making the launcher unusable.

rows.Title: Camera Color turns to purple on clicking moon pictures
rows.Problem: Images taken of the moon with 100x zoom turn purple after capture, despite appearing normal initially. The issue occurs only during moon photo capture at high zoom and does not happen with other photos or settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken of the moon at 100x zoom turn purple after capture, despite appearing normal initially.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core camera function during high-zoom photo capture, resulting in visibly distorted images that compromise user experience and photo quality.

rows.Title: Status Bar Elements color does not adjust accordingly
rows.Problem: Text in the status bar does not automatically adjust to match the background color of the app, making readability difficult.
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar text fails to adjust its color to match the app background, reducing readability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects readability in some apps but does not cause device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Bluetooth showing different device name and different battery percentage from one showing in beats app
rows.Problem: Bluetooth is showing different device names and different battery percentages compared to what is shown in the Beats app, causing both Beats products to have reduced audio effects and performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth displays inconsistent device names and battery percentages compared to the Beats app, leading to reduced audio performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent device information but does not render the device unusable or cause system crashes.

rows.Title: Camera Viewfinder moves and device vibrates when open camera
rows.Problem: When I open the camera and change the lens, the viewfinder moves, and the phone vibrates for a bit.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera viewfinder moves and the device vibrates when the camera is opened and the lens is changed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable disturbance during camera use but does not prevent the device from functioning or cause a complete failure.

rows.Title: Mx player is not working properly it is getting crashed
rows.Problem: Mx player is not working properly its getting crased again and again
rows.Summarized Problem: Mx player repeatedly crashes and fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The app consistently crashes, preventing normal usage and rendering the feature unusable.

rows.Title: Live match notification content getting cropped
rows.Problem: The country flags are getting cropped
rows.Summarized Problem: Country flags in live match notifications are being cropped on the display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual content display but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Notification icon size significantly reduced after update
rows.Problem: The size of the notification icon is significantly less making it very much harder to check what app has given the notifications
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification icon size has been significantly reduced after update, making it difficult to identify which app sent a notification.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability but does not cause device failure or crash; users can still see notifications, just with reduced visibility.

rows.Title: Lock screen date and time flickering when expanded
rows.Problem: Lock screen date and time is flickering when touching
rows.Summarized Problem: The date and time on the lock screen flicker when touched.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction of the lock screen date and time display, affecting user interaction but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Touches don't get recognised
rows.Problem: Touches don't get recognised on the device
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience touch input not being recognised on the device.

rows.Summarized Problem: A permanent black portion appears at the Home, Back, and Menu buttons when using the moving background feature on the lock screen or home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a persistent black screen on essential navigation buttons, making the device unusable during navigation.

rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect any device to the mobile hotspot, showing a 'wep password required' error despite configuring wpa2 or wpa3.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a basic connectivity function, preventing users from sharing internet, which renders the device unusable for core functionality.

rows.Problem: Gemini crashes multiple times, screen recording doesn't work, and phone becomes overheated and unusable
rows.Summarized Problem: Gemini crashes repeatedly and screen recording fails, making the device unusable and overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes multiple crashes and renders the device unusable, with overheating indicating potential system instability.

rows.Problem: Call continues on watch even after disconnecting the call on the phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The call continues to display on the watch after it has been disconnected on the phone.

rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby fails to respond to voice commands when the device is not awakened, and does not accept calls during active calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby is completely failing to respond to voice commands and not accepting calls, making it unusable for core functionality.

rows.Title: Font style and UI changes to tablet UI after update

rows.Title: Unable to add 4th contact in widget
rows.Problem: The 4 contact widget can only accomodate 3 contacts, fix that

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the widget's contact capacity, preventing full functionality but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to connect Buds 3 pro

rows.Title: Watch ultra keeps frequently disconnecting
rows.Problem: Watch ultra keeps frequently disconnecting
rows.Summarized Problem: The Watch Ultra frequently disconnects from the device.

rows.Title: Battery discharge fast with normal usage

rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery discharges rapidly during normal usage, dropping from 98% to below 20% within a 12-hour period.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains excessively under normal conditions, rendering the device unusable within a day without charging.

rows.Title: Battery draining very fast
rows.Problem: After the latest update beta 3, battery drainage issues very fast

rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel fails to open after device restart and requires accessibility settings reset to function properly.

rows.Title: Throttling while multiple apps being opened
rows.Problem: Throttling while multiple apps being opened. Yesterday, I had 2 apps opened, one was a low resolution game and 2 was a browser app. All of a sudden the phone started throttling and I had to restart my phone to use it again.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device throttles when multiple apps are opened, causing performance degradation and requiring a restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during app usage, leading to a full restart, indicating a critical performance failure.

rows.Title: Always on display is not changing its position
rows.Problem: Always on display is not changing its position at all continuously showing in the same exact position causing Oled burn in so make it as previous updates changing AOD positions automatically. Also, it shows continuously for 10 seconds when new notifications arrive, unnecessarily draining the battery.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always on Display feature does not change its position and continuously shows for 10 seconds upon notifications, leading to battery drain and potential OLED burn-in.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes continuous display of content in a fixed position, leading to battery drain and potential hardware damage (OLED burn-in), which is a major risk to device longevity and usability.
