rows.Problem: Camera faces auto focus issues when it's night time, which sometimes results in photos getting blurry.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to focus automatically during nighttime, resulting in blurry photos.
rows.Severity Reason: Nighttime auto focus failure directly impacts photo quality and usability, making the camera function unreliable in common use cases.

rows.Title: Galaxy Enhance X application not responding
rows.Problem: Galaxy Enhance X application not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Enhance X application is not responding.
rows.Severity Reason: The application is not responding, which prevents user interaction and renders the feature unusable.

rows.Title: In macro mode focus shifting continuous
rows.Problem: In macro mode focus shifting continuous
rows.Summarized Problem: Focus shifting continuously in macro mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction in macro mode, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain observed in the device
rows.Problem: Battery drains from 87% to 37% during simple WhatsApp and calling usage, even when the phone is unused overnight, with expected battery level being 60-50% instead.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain during basic usage like WhatsApp and calls, dropping from 87% to 37% overnight despite minimal use.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is severe and occurs during normal usage, leading to a rapid loss of charge and rendering the device unusable without frequent recharging.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor is not recognising after ZUHB beta update
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor is not recognising after ZUHB beta update. All applications using fingerprint authorisation are not able to recognise already saved fingerprints. Even not able to register new fingerprint.
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor fails to recognise saved fingerprints and cannot register new ones after a beta update.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot authenticate with fingerprint, which is a core security and usability function on the lock screen.

rows.Title: Device goes into recent app drawer automatically
rows.Problem: Device goes into recent app drawer automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically enters the recent apps drawer.
rows.Severity Reason: The device unexpectedly enters the recent apps mode, making it difficult to use normally.

rows.Title: Dynamic clock for Drive mode not working
rows.Problem: The dynamic clock on the lock screen doesn’t work when using a preset lock screen in Routine mode. For example, I’ve set a lock screen with a dynamic clock for Driving Mode, but it isn’t functioning.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dynamic clock feature on the lock screen fails to function when a preset lock screen is set to Driving Mode in Routine mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as intended in a specific scenario but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Quick Panel not working
rows.Problem: Control centre or the notifications touch is not working sometimes. Need to restart the device to fix this bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel and notification touch controls are not working and require device restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a key interface element but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Whenever any of the news link is clicked page opens with error
rows.Problem: Whenever any of the news link is clicked, it opens a page with error. None of the news link is working.
rows.Summarized Problem: Clicking any news link results in an error page, and no news links are functional.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access news content at all, rendering a core feature unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to block spam messages
rows.Problem: Samsung Messages app does not allow users to block marketing and promotional messages, showing an error 'invalid number' when attempting to block, and 99% of such messages follow the same format with no alternative blocking method.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot block marketing messages in the Samsung Messages app due to an error message indicating an invalid number, even though these messages are sent from standard 10-digit numbers.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to perform a basic core function (blocking spam), making it unusable for users who rely on this feature, and prevents effective spam management.

rows.Title: Unable to click picture of billboard
rows.Problem: The railway board is unable to click in station while traveling
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot take pictures of billboards at railway stations while traveling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents picture capture in a specific scenario but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Irrelevant apps showing for opening pdf file
rows.Problem: When i open pdf in whatsapp it doesn't shows relevant app in selection options
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp does not show relevant apps when opening a PDF file.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in app selection functionality during PDF opening, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to install any app from Play store under secure folder
rows.Problem: Unable to install any app from Play store under secure folder
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install apps from the Play Store within the secure folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents app installation in a secure folder, which is a partial malfunction of a core feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drops from 33% to 29% in 8 minutes
rows.Problem: My battery was at 33 percent, and it fell to 29 in just 8 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery level drops significantly within a short period of time.
rows.Severity Reason: Rapid battery consumption makes the device unusable within a short time frame.

rows.Title: Camera Night mode Pictures having flares and so much noise with green tint
rows.Problem: Pictures taken in night mode have flares, noise, and a green tint, both with and without night mode. The samples are poor for a high-priced phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Night mode in camera produces images with flares, noise, and a green tint, resulting in poor photo quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality significantly, rendering night mode unusable and damaging user experience in a core camera feature.

rows.Title: Battery widget is going blank
rows.Problem: Battery widget is going blank
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery widget on the device is displaying blank or missing information.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery widget is not functioning properly, but the device remains usable and core functions are not affected.

rows.Title: Notification icon glitch on lockscreen
rows.Problem: Notification icon glitch on lockscreen
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification icons appear incorrectly on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual display but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Camera quality is very poor in Telephoto lens
rows.Problem: Camera quality is very poor in Telephoto lens and blurry
rows.Summarized Problem: The telephoto lens on the camera produces poor and blurry images.
rows.Severity Reason: The telephoto lens fails to produce clear images, significantly impacting user experience and functionality.

rows.Title: Video have noise in indoor lighting condition
rows.Problem: Video looks GRAINY in INDOORS which doesn't look good. Video processing in INDOORS need to be improved
rows.Summarized Problem: Indoor videos appear grainy due to poor video processing under indoor lighting conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video quality in indoor settings but does not cause device failure or complete malfunction.

rows.Title: Videos looks Grainy bad and need to turn down brightness to not see the grains
rows.Problem: Videos look grainy, especially in woolen black or blue pants, and appear bad in video despite being fine in photos; brightness must be reduced to minimize visibility of graininess.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings appear grainy, especially in certain colors, requiring reduced brightness to view them clearly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video quality in specific scenarios but does not cause device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: Link to windows is not working properly
rows.Problem: Link to windows is not working properly as it is showing can't connect to Laptop again and again
rows.Summarized Problem: The link to Windows feature fails to connect and repeatedly shows 'can't connect to Laptop'.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to establish a connection, preventing users from accessing their laptop, which is essential for device integration.

rows.Title: Recent tabs do not change according to light/dark mode
rows.Problem: The recent tabs panel on Samsung S25 with OneUI 8 does not update its color mode when switching between light and dark mode; it only changes when tapping an app individually.
rows.Summarized Problem: The recent tabs panel fails to update its light/dark mode when the device's system theme changes, only updating when an app is tapped.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: The notification text is out of place
rows.Problem: The notification text is out of place. When expanded the text is top aligned. Even if there is a icon that is also misplaced.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification text is misaligned and top-aligned when expanded, with the icon also misplaced in the quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual layout but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Launcher App disappear from recent tab when switch to other app
rows.Problem: Some apps disappear from the recent apps tab when switching to other apps, even though they remain active and can be opened instantly. The issue occurs randomly with no noticeable pattern.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps vanish from the recent apps tab when switching between apps, though they remain active and can be reopened immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frustration due to difficulty accessing recently used apps, but does not prevent device operation or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: Instagram message screen is showing black bar at the top
rows.Problem: Instagram message screen is showing black bar at the top
rows.Summarized Problem: The Instagram message screen displays a black bar at the top.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display of a specific screen but does not cause device failure or complete malfunction.

rows.Title: Snoaring detection is not happening
rows.Problem: Snoaring detection is not happening and sometimes sleep time is not accurate
rows.Summarized Problem: Snoaring detection is not functioning and sleep time accuracy is occasionally incorrect.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent inaccuracies in sleep time detection but does not render the device unusable or cause system crashes.

rows.Title: Video quality at UHD 60fps looks so grainy
rows.Problem: The selfie camera video quality looks awful when at UHD 60fps it looks so grainy indoors that it seems unusable. Please fix I want my videos to look sharp.
rows.Summarized Problem: The selfie camera produces grainy video quality at UHD 60fps indoors, making it unusable for clear recordings.
rows.Severity Reason: The video quality is so poor that it renders the feature unusable in practical indoor conditions.

rows.Title: Whatsapp and Fiverr notification do not occur on lock screen
rows.Problem: Notifications for WhatsApp and Fiverr only appear when the screen is unlocked, despite adjusting notification and background usage settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp and Fiverr notifications do not appear on the lock screen and only show when the device is unlocked.
rows.Severity Reason: Users miss important notifications when the screen is locked, which significantly impacts usability and communication.

rows.Title: When opening pdf file in Whatsapp, suggestion apps are not compatible for document reading
rows.Problem: Opening a pdf file in WhatsApp is suggesting unrelated apps. Instead of doc reader, it shows reddit, google wallet, google. Opening a file leads to error.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp suggests unrelated apps when opening PDF files instead of a document reader, leading to errors.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot properly open PDF files, resulting in errors and a failure to access documents, which is a core functionality failure.

rows.Title: Too many spam calls after Beta version update
rows.Problem: Frequent spam calls and messages on Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra after beta version update, threatening privacy and security during official tasks.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users receive frequent spam calls and messages after beta update, posing privacy and security risks.
rows.Severity Reason: Spam calls threaten user privacy and security, especially during official tasks, making the device unsafe to use.

rows.Title: Widgets remain in color pallete theme after color pallete turned off
rows.Problem: Widgets and widget text on the lock screen remain in color palette theme after color palette is turned off, while notification panel icons revert to normal.
rows.Summarized Problem: Lock screen widgets retain color palette theme after it is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific widget display but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: AOD turns off automatically
rows.Problem: Always on display turns off automatically once or twice daily, even when the 'show always' option is set in settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display turns off unexpectedly despite being set to show always.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature intermittently fails despite user configuration, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Images captured in 200mp are of very bad quality
rows.Problem: Images captured in 200mp camera have very bad quality
rows.Summarized Problem: Images captured in 200mp mode have very poor quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera produces significantly poor-quality images in 200mp mode, which directly impacts user experience and device functionality.

rows.Title: Images captured in low light are blurry
rows.Problem: The photo captured from 12 mp camera is blurry when clicking in low light conditions or mild light, rather than in sunlight
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken with the 12 MP camera are blurry in low or mild light conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo clarity in low light but does not cause device crashes or complete failure of camera function.

rows.Title: Unable to set Vascular Load baseline though sleep data available
rows.Problem: The watch shows sleep data for many days but does not complete any vascular load baseline readings, despite wearing the watch continuously during sleep and sleeping for 6 to 7 hours nightly without waking up.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to complete vascular load baseline readings despite having sufficient sleep data and continuous wear.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents consistent measurement of vascular load but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Expert Raw Camera crashes multiple times
rows.Problem: Expert raw camera application crashes many times
rows.Summarized Problem: The Expert Raw Camera application crashes repeatedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The application crashes multiple times, making it unusable for users who rely on this feature.

rows.Title: Portrait image background blur is not good
rows.Problem: The blur effect in portrait mode is poor and not as expected, with visible issues in the background blur of photos taken using the camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The background blur effect in portrait mode is poor and does not meet user expectations.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual quality of portrait photos but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: App icons display blank when added in folder view
rows.Problem: Application icons occasionally fail to render, displaying as blank spaces until the folder is expanded
rows.Summarized Problem: Application icons fail to render properly in folder view, showing as blank spaces until the folder is expanded.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of app visibility in folder view but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
